content:
If you haven't read the :ref:`intro` yet, we'd encourage you to do that first.
The best way to get help if you get stuck is to ask a question on `Cilium Slack`_. With Cilium contributors across the globe, there is almost always someone available to help.
Setup Cilium ============
If you have not set up Cilium yet, follow the guide :ref:`k8s_install_standard` for instructions on how to quickly bootstrap a Kubernetes cluster and install Cilium. If in doubt, pick the minikube route, you will be good to go in less than 5 minutes.
